articles.content: On Jan. 14, just a day before The Bear and Bottoms star Ayo Edebiriwould win her first Emmy, the actress, writer and comedian would shout out Ireland while accepting a Critics Choice Award for best a… [+3590 chars]

articles.author: LINDSEY BAHR
articles.title: For Netflix documentaries, there's no place like Sundance - The Associated Press
articles.description: Ten years after “The Square,” an acquisition that put Netflix documentaries on the map, the streamer is back at the Sundance Film Festival with an eye towards acquisitions and two very different originals. Ford’s latest, “Power,” an inquiry into the evolution…
articles.content: PARK CITY, Utah (AP) Filmmaker Yance Ford was in a Sundance haze when he took a meeting with Netflix following the premiere of Strong Island in 2017. The streamer was still somewhat new in the origin… [+5850 chars]
